channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: New bus stop blocked by parked cars, 8th December
item.description:
Parked cars from house across the road, and parents waiting to pickup kids from Bournside school, blocking up the road, bus cannot stop at bus stop has to stop on our drive due to the ongoing parking problem, Friday after school was mayhem with honking horns and heavey traffic due to the parked cars not moveing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Gwernant Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on pecked lane, 8th December
item.description:
Multiple potholes on pecked lane between fieldgate road and ashfield road - both sides. Result of recent heavy rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pecked Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severn Trent took a bollard down, 8th December
item.description:
Severn Trent took a bollard down on the corner of Hales Rd and London Road and it is just laying on the grass. Someone was then able to park and dump a mattress. I have reported that to Cheltenham Council. This happened Saturday/ Sunday 6th/7th December 2025.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
